channel.title: Abouts on Biblio99: Philosophy Streams
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Biblio99: Philosophy Streams

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m a lawyer and philosophy graduate student who leads a live discussion on a different topic in philosophy or law each week (right now, they’re Thurday nights at 7:00pm edt). My main interest is in ethics, epistemology, and philosophy of law, but we’ve had conversations about tons of topics. My motivation was to learn about philoosphy outside of the classroom and to have discussions with folks whose diverse experiences would lead to richer discussion.
